history.narrative: Law 1-38 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-78, which was referred to the Committee on Governmental Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 29, 1975 and September 9, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 6, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-52 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
